title: B-gata H-kei (Yamada's First Time: B Gata H Kei)
synopsis: Most people, including the girl herself, would say that first year high school student Yamada is beautiful and perfect. Despite this, she is working towards a peculiar goal: to have sex with one hundred men by the end of high school.
